import React, { Component } from "react"; import Tooltip from "./Tooltip"; import "../Styles/App.css"; class Members extends Component { componentWillMount() { this.update(); } update = () => { this.setState({ members: this.props.members }); }; render() { const list = this.props.members.map((group, key) => { return (
{group[0].name}
{group[0].jobs}
{group[1].name}
{group[1].jobs}
{group[2].name}
{group[2].jobs}
{group[3].name}
{group[3].jobs}
); }); return
{list}
; } } export default Members;
